comments: I really enjoyed Professor Alderton as a teacher. She "gets" education. She models what she is teaching and is a super fast grader. If you do the work, you will get a good grade. The hybrid aspect of her class was great and made the class more hands on. She is very approachable.

Dr. Alderton seemed really intimidating in the beginning but as the semester went on I began to realize that she acts that way in order to help us build confidence in ourselves. You get a lot of teaching experience in her class. I really enjoyed her as a professor!

I wish I could have told you interim would be murder on you. She created a "hybrid" class with 1/2 online 1/2 classroom, and could not implement it at all. Never gave clear directions, changed them midway through, and had tons of busy work. The class content is somewhat useful, but could be taught without so much busy work amounting to little value

This class was impossible to follow. I am a 3.6 gpa student who normally doesn\'t have to do much for classes. I spent 6-10 hours on homework each night of interim. Prof. is unclear, and impossible to follow. I was told on numerous occasions I was wrong (with no constructive feedback), even though I followed her directions.
